question:
An IT Engineer needs to create a Virtual Machine in Azure.
Currently, the IT Engineer has an Android OS based workstation.
Which of the following can the IT Engineer use to create the desired Virtual Machine in Azure.
[select 3]

Which of the following customers are eligible to use
Azure Government to develop a cloud solution.
(Select TWO)

A company is planning to set up an Azure Free Account.
Does the Standard Support plan come along with the Azure Free Account?

A company is planning to use its Azure Free Account for hosting production-based resources.
Does the Azure Free Account allow you to host production-based resources?

Your company is planning to use Azure AD for the
authentication of the resources defined in Azure.
Does Azure AD have the capabilities to implement
authorization using Azure RBAC to secure resources?

Does the Azure AD Premium P2 tier guarantee any Azure AD
Services available with the availability higher than 99.99%?

A company plans to upgrade its current Azure AD Free plan to the Azure AD Premium P1 plan.
Does Microsoft provide the same feature set for both plans?

A company wants to try out some services which Azure is offering in Public Preview.
Do the services in Public Preview in Azure come with an SLA?

A company wants to try out some services which Azure is offering in preview.
Does Microsoft provide a separate portal to work with preview features?

Your company needs to deploy and manage several
Azure Web apps using the Azure App service resource.
Which of the following URL would you use to manage the Azure Web Apps?

A company needs to store 2 TB worth of data that is infrequently used.
The data needs to be accessed via Power BI.
Which of the following could be used as a cost-effective data layer for this requirement?

A company wants to ensure that their company's users are authenticated
when they access resources defined in their Azure account.
Which of the following is the correct definition of authentication?

options.A: This specifies the type of service you can use in Azure.
options.B: This specifies the type of data you can use in Azure.
options.C: This is the act of providing legitimate credentials.
options.D: This specifies what you can do in Azure.
